overview: Dr. Lindenbaum oversees the development of the Companyâ€™s technology and its plant cell line engineering applications. Prior to joining Agrisoma, Dr. Lindenbaum held a variety of positions at Chromos Molecular Systems Inc., most recently as the Senior Director of Chromosome Engineering. His efforts in this role focused on applying the technology to the optimization of mammalian cell line engineering and to cell-based protein production. Dr. Lindenbaumâ€™s work in this area contributed to the development of a large dominant patent portfolio of novel methods for the development and engineering of platform artificial chromosomes. Dr. Lindenbaum received his Ph.D. in Biochemistry from McGill University.
